definitions.definition: To grind to a fine powder , to pulverize .
To mix two solid reactants by repeated grinding and stirring .
To break up biological tissue into individual cells via passage through a narrow opening such as a hypodermic needle .

main_definition: To grind to a fine powder , to pulverize .
secondary_definitions: To mix two solid reactants by repeated grinding and stirring .
To break up biological tissue into individual cells via passage through a narrow opening such as a hypodermic needle .
